item.title: Aon announces the recipients of the Aon Best Employers Singapore 2017 award
item.description:
Employee engagement at companies recognized as Aon Best Employers rose by two percentage points this year, reaching 82%. Aon Best Employers are setting the standard for positive employer branding, achieving scores from 83% to 92% in employee perception across all levels of tenure. Five special recognitions were given this year, including the introduction of a new award category: Best Employer for Startups. Source: Aon. Aon Best Employers Singapore 2017...
